001package eu.andredick;
002
003import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.ACOAlgorithm;
004import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm;
005import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.Statistics;
006import eu.andredick.aco.ant.ACOAnt;
007import eu.andredick.aco.combination.CombinationSum;
008import eu.andredick.aco.construction.ConstructionFromElements;
009import eu.andredick.aco.heuristic.HeuristicInfoSet;
010import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.LocalSearchAntCover;
011import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessElitist;
012import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.NextStepStrategyOnSubsets;
013import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.AbstractPheromoneEvaporation;
014import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.PheromoneEvaporation;
015import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.AbstractPheromoneInit;
016import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.PheromoneInit;
017import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.PerceptionSimple;
018import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets;
019import eu.andredick.aco.solutionquality.SolutionQualityMin;
020import eu.andredick.aco.termination.TerminationCriterion;
021import eu.andredick.configuration.*;
022import eu.andredick.scp.SCPSolution;
023import eu.andredick.tools.ChartTools;
024import eu.andredick.tools.MatConvert;
025
026import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessBasic;
027import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneassociation.PheromoneOnSubsets;
028import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
029import eu.andredick.tools.orlib.OrlibConverter;
030
031public class Main {
032
033    public static void main(String[] args) {
034        // 设置覆盖矩阵
035        String mat_name = "Coverage.mat";  // 指定mat文件名
036        SCProblem problem = MatConvert.Mat_to_SCP(mat_name);
037        // 使用自定义策略
038        AlgorithmConfiguration_self Alg_config = new AlgorithmConfiguration_self();
039        AbstractAlgorithm aco_algorithm = Alg_config.create(problem);
040
041        // ACO算法开始执行
042        aco_algorithm.run();
043        // 获取统计信息
044        Statistics statistics = aco_algorithm.getStatistics();
045        float[] min_array = statistics.getIterationMinValuesArray();
046        //可视化迭代结果
047        ChartTools chart = new ChartTools("迭代最优值", "iterations", "value");
048        chart.addDataSeries("ants", min_array);
049    }
050}
